article_title: Consol Energy Profit Slips, But Beats Estimates
article_text:
Consol Energy Inc. said its first-quarter profit dropped 32%, as lower commodity prices offset increased production volume.

The company’s profit and revenue still topped analysts’ expectations.

Consol operates through two divisions: natural gas energy and production, and coal. As with other miners, the company has had to contend with...
